Text: Canadian CurvesFrom all the information I am gathering the Canadian gas curves should be out by Houston time Kathy Reeves said the power curves should follow minutes after the gas curves After talking with Phillip Love who is the Central Risk lead it seems the traders are always away from their desks when its time to load curves The usual response from the risk people is we cant find the trader when we are inquiring about the curve load Any help you could give us would be GREATLY appreciated Thanks K
Curvesthe power curve was out shortly before Youre the BEST
